# IPO
```{r}
ipo2021 <- read.csv("~/Downloads/ipos-2021.csv")

ipo2021 <- ipo2021 %>%
  mutate("IPO.q1" = str_detect(IPO.Date, c("Jan", "Feb", "Mar"), negate = FALSE)) %>%
  filter(IPO.q1 == TRUE)
```
